Giraffes are the tallest living animals on land. They can grow up to 18 feet tall and weigh up to 2,600 pounds.

Giraffes are the tallest living land animals, reaching heights of up to 5.5 meters (18 feet). They have long necks and legs, and their horns, or ossicones, can reach up to 1.5 meters (5 feet) in length.
